item.title: Bowes Road N11, 22nd November
item.description:
The pavements of Bowes Road N11 are a mess. They have not been swept or cleared of rubbish or leaves. The same rubbish has been in situ for over a month now and yet the Council have employed street sweepers. What exactly are they paid to do if not, clear the pavements.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bowes Road, New Southgate, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bromley leaf department cleaning department, 22nd November
item.description:
This week was a very rare occasion when they come round to clean Rodway Road BR1 3JJ They came briefly last week to clean the leaves unfortunately they only decided to do half the street and never came back Every year I have to ring and complain to the council about the poor workmanship Please come back and clean the streets up properly not just half of it there’s no reasons why No vehicles were blocking the area they missed

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rodway Road, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large picture has be dumped beside a litter bin, which is itself overflowing, near the bus stop for buses going in the direction of Welling., 22nd November
item.description:
Usually the bin is emptied regularly, but yesterday evening I picked up a lot of litter around the area due to the bin being full, and this evening along with more litter on the ground I also found this dumped picture.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crook Log, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: SAFETY CONCERN Telegraph pole has hanging cable. Dangerous, 22nd November
item.description:
Telegraph pole no DP1932 has a cable hanging at head height to an adult pedestrian. The coiled cable is swinging in the wind. It hot my head as I walked by. Needs attention promptly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Northfield Road, Ponders End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Food waste spillage /dump - been there well over 24hrs, 22nd November
item.description:
Large amounts of food waste along the road. It was there on Friday morning. It’s hard to cross the road safely at Westwood Park. It smells. This morning there was a dead fox that must have been run over eating the food.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Honor Oak Road, Forest Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping Bournemouth Close, 22nd November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Parkstone Road, Peckham, Greater London
